column1: Number of Netflix paying streaming subscribers in the United States and Canada from 1st quarter 2013 to 2nd quarter 2021 (in millions)

column4:
In the second quarter of 2021, Netflix had about 74 million U.S. and Canada subscribers. The subscriber base in these two countries accounts for the majority of Netflix's worldwide streaming subscriber base , which in the second of 2021 stood at around 209.18 million. 


Furthermore, as the number of streaming subscribers in the United States has grown, the number of DVD subscribers has sharply declined.
